text: Robert Englund (born June 6, 1949 in Glendale, CaliforniaRobert Englund Biography (1949-)) is an American actor. He is most famous for playing Freddy Krueger in the A Nightmare on Elm Street movies. ==References== ==Other websites== *Robert Englund's official website * *Robert Englund interview with the Horror Asylum *Robert Englund interview by Ladyghost *Robert Englund interview by AOL Canada *Robert Englund interview with The Phantom Zone Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:A Nightmare on Elm Street Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Glendale, California
title: Robert Englund
